Works fine on Vista and Windows 7 alike, just use Compatibility mode and run as Administrator. Thanks for the upload.

Also, for those who say "Vista sucks", why was Vista the required operating system for 50% of the games released after 2007, and why does XP not support DirectX10? Oh, right, because Vista is a better operating system. XP requires more resources than ME, which required more resources than 98, and etc. It's called an "upgraded OS", it requires more to run, but supports more. Grow up, stop being stubborn, upgrade your computer, and get with the times. :]
